meanings.definition: To surpass in pursuit or chase.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah outpursues the gazelle in the race.
meanings.sent2: The police officer outpursues the criminal through the crowded streets.
meanings.sent3: The determined dog outpursues the squirrel up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition outpursues her peers in the competitive industry.
meanings.sent5: The athlete outpursues all others in the marathon, claiming victory.

meanings.definition: To exceed in the act of pursuing.
meanings.sent1: The hunter outpursues his prey through the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The detective outpursues the suspect in solving the mystery.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten outpursues the laser pointer around the room.
meanings.sent4: His dedication outpursues any obstacles in achieving his goals.
meanings.sent5: The student outpursues her classmates in academic achievements.

meanings.definition: To outdo in the act of chasing or following.
meanings.sent1: The hound outpursues the scent of the fox in the woods.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outpursues the world record in the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The curious child outpursues his friends in exploring the new playground.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outpursues any doubts in reaching her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The car outpursues the others on the racetrack, taking the lead.
